KnowledgeBase.Title: Example Matrix compareEQ 007
KnowledgeBase.RelatedFunctions: compare compareNE compareGT compareGE compareLT compareLE

Example.Description: These examples use the compareEQ function to compare two Matrices and return the Boolean value, true or false. The values of each Matrix are compared to determine whether the Matrices are equal or not.

Syntax.Note:
The value of the first Matrix is not equal to the value
of the second Matrix.

The value of the first Matrix is not equal to the value
of the second Matrix.
